title: Font from logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725165802im_/http:/typophile.com/files/selectfire_4489.jpg)
  
Having trouble finding a font with the same "R"

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [selectfire.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725165802/http:/typophile.com/files/selectfire.jpg) | 21.22 KB |
author: trayc

comments.content: The R is hand constructed so if you have everything else try an /I plus a cut /R.
